units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=First Boot Setup
After=systemd-machine-id-commit.service
After=network-online.target
Before=zincati.service
ConditionPathExists=!/var/lib/%N.stamp

[Service]
Type=oneshot
RemainAfterExit=yes
ExecStart=/usr/bin/rpm-ostree install firewalld qemu-guest-agent kubeadm kubectl kubelet cri-o
ExecStart=/usr/bin/rpm-ostree uninstall zram-generator-defaults
ExecStart=/usr/bin/curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GrapheneOS/infrastructure/refs/heads/main/chrony.conf -o /etc/chrony.conf
ExecStart=/bin/systemctl disable systemd-resolved
ExecStart=/bin/touch /var/lib/%N.stamp
ExecStart=/bin/systemctl --no-block reboot

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: postinst.service

units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Kubelet
After=containerd.service
Wants=containerd.service

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/kubelet
Restart=always
RestartSec=10
EnvironmentFile=/etc/sysconfig/kubelet

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: kubelet.service
